patthana23.15:1.1: Nakusalaṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.15:2.1: Nakusalaṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.15:3.1: Nakusalaṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
